block.p: MINNESOTA MINING AND MANUFACTURING CO., St. Paul, bought the closely held Dynapro Systems Inc., Vancouver, British Columbia, for an undisclosed price to enter the market for touch-screen components, computers and terminals.

DELPHI AUTOMOTIVE SYSTEMS CORP., Troy, Mich., said it had received commitments from two automakers for power liftgate and power sliding- door products valued at $350 million for the life of the contracts. The company declined to identify the automakers.

MINNESOTA MINING AND MANUFACTURING CO., St. Paul, bought the closely held Dynapro Systems Inc., Vancouver, British Columbia, for an undisclosed price to enter the market for touch-screen components, computers and terminals.

DELPHI AUTOMOTIVE SYSTEMS CORP., Troy, Mich., said it had received commitments from two automakers for power liftgate and power sliding- door products valued at $350 million for the life of the contracts. The company declined to identify the automakers.
EXXON MOBIL CORP., Irving, Tex., agreed to sell 11 gasoline stations and a storage terminal in Guam to South Pacific Petroleum Corp. of Guam for an undisclosed price.
PACIFICARE HEALTH SYSTEMS INC., Santa Ana, Calif., said it would close Medicare health maintenance organization plans serving more than 23,000 Medicare patients next year.
